function as something.translation[0].def: if something functions as a particular thing, it does what that type of thing normally does, or is used as that thing
A library is functioning as a temporary hospital to cope with casualties.
function as something.translation[1].def: to become something else or to do the work of another person or thing
The British Chamber of Commerce cannot function as a holding company, but can carry out service activities for the group.
It took a year to train a group of people to function as general managers.
